hanzi-su-wiki:
企

Значения

Замышлять, строить планы; затевать, замышлять (дурное)

Мнемоника

Человек 人, поднявшийся на ноги 止 для прыжка или действия.
purpleculture_pinyin:
qǐ
to plan a project; to stand on tiptoe; Taiwan pr. [qi4]; abbr. for 企业 [qi3 ye4]
спланировать проект; стоять на цыпочках; Тайвань пр. [qi4]; сокр. для 企业 [qi3 ye4]
rtega_mnemonic:
企企RSstand on tiptoe, hope, long, expect, plan
  • RS. a man 人 standing on tiptoe 止: he's hoping to get moving soon and execute his plan
purpleculture_info: Ideographic: A man 人 on his feet 止; 止 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
企业 [ qǐ yè ]: company; firm; enterprise; corporation; Classifiers: 家
企图 [ qǐ tú ]: to attempt; to try; attempt; Classifiers: 种
企业家 [ qǐ yè jiā ]: entrepreneur
国企 [ guó qǐ ]: state enterprise; (Tw) abbr. for 国际企业管理 , international business management (as a subject of study)
企业主 [ qǐ yè zhǔ ]: owner of enterprise
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 人 [ rén ] man, person; people
    • 止 [ zhǐ ] to stop, to halt; to detain; to desist
heisig_keyword: undertake | предпринять, attempt попытка, план, дизайн
heisig_chinese_memo: Mary Poppins floated down with her umbrella to undertake the job of stopping the children's misbehaving. The kids have nothing to look forward to now.
heisig_story: To undertake a project is to take some idea floating in the air and stop it so that it can be brought down to earth and become a reality. Here we see some undertaking made to stop under a beach umbrella.
koohiiStory1: Mary Poppins floated down with her umbrella to undertake the job of stopping the children´s misbehaving.
koohiiStory2: The Undertaker is an evil WWE wrestler - he beat his opponent with an umbrella until he stopped moving.
jp_example_words:
企画(きかく): planning, project
企業(きぎょう): enterprise, undertaking
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The hat comes to a stop, thinking of a plan. The hat had been pacing around for a while, trying to think of how to get off the head he's resting upon and back into the house where it's nice and cozy, and came to the sudden realization of a plan. This caused the hat to stop.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine a hat walking about on your head, pacing back and forth deep in thought. See the hat stroke its chin in contemplation as it tries to think up a plan to get off your noggin and back inside.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The plan that made this hat stop right in its tracks was very simple. First, obtain the key (き) to the house. Then, use the key to get in the front door. How simple!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Watch as the hat begins to grin. This plan is so simple it’s sure to work. Now watch as the hat obtains the key and enters the locked door. What sort of mischief will the hat get into once inside?
Ru_trainchinese:

qǐ: (графема) ждать с нетерпением; вставать на цыпочки
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the man (𠆢) stops (止) to plan
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Mary Poppins floated down with her umbrella to undertake the job of stopping the children's misbehaving. The kids have nothing to look forward to now.
humanum_full_description_en:
Elaboration: The inscription " person " stands on the " stop ", protruding the foot of the person to show that the action is related to the foot. The original meaning is standing on tiptoe, raising the heel, and extending the meaning of hope and expectation. "Shuowen": "Qi, raise the heel. From the person, stop the sound. 𠈮, the ancient prose is to follow the foot." "Raising the heel" means raising the heel. Duan Yucai's note: "Click here to download the silent word, there is no sound. This is true. The stop part says: "Stop is the foot." When the text has no toes, stop the toes. From the person, the stop, take the person to extend Meaning." According to the word " enterprise ", the foot is gradually separated from " person ", so the word from " person " to " stop " can be followed.

Oracle " Enterprise " is used as a place name. "Tunnan" 179: "Only (in) the enterprise." "Compilation" 19369: "Tian Qidong" refers to the hunting in the east of the enterprise. " Enterprises " in Oracle and Bronze are used as names.

Since " Qi " refers to standing on tiptoe, it can also refer to looking far away, "Han Shu. "Gao Di Ji": "Day and night and look forward to returning." Yan Shigu's note: "Enterprise means to lift one's feet and bend one's body." " Enterprise " is like standing on tiptoe and looking into the distance. People who make such a posture must have expectations, and therefore have the meaning of hope, hope, and hope (Shirakawa Jing). Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "Qu Huang can't follow the scene."
humanum_short_description_en: Synopsis: The inscription " person " stands on the " stop ", protruding the foot of the person to show that the action is related to the foot. The original meaning is standing on tiptoe, raising the heel, and extending the meaning of hope and expectation.
humanum_full_description:
甲金文象「人」立於「止」上，突出人的足部，以表明動作與足有關。本義為踮着腳尖、抬起腳跟站立，引申有企望、企盼之義。《說文》：「企，舉踵也。从人，止聲。𠈮，古文企从足。」「舉踵」即抬起腳跟。段玉裁注：「按此下本無聲字，有聲非也。今正。止部曰：『止爲足。』說文無趾，止卽趾也。从人、止，取人延竦之意。」按「企」字足部漸從「人」分離，故字從「人」從「止」，段說可從。

　　甲骨文「企」用作地名。《屯南》179：「才(在)企。」《合集》19369：「田企東」，指於企地東方田獵。甲骨文、金文「企」用作人名。

　　由於「企」指踮腳站立，因而又可指翹首遠望，《漢書．高帝紀上》：「日夜企而望歸。」顏師古注：「企謂舉足而竦身。」「企」象踮起足尖眺望遠處，從而有了翹首遠望之義。人做出如此姿勢，定是有所期待，因而又有企望、企求、企盼之義(白川靜)。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「渠黃不能企其景。」
humanum_short_description: 甲金文象「人」立於「止」上，突出人的足部，以表明動作與足有關。本義為踮着腳尖、抬起腳跟站立，引申有企望、企盼之義。

甲金文象「 人 」立於「 止 」上，突出人的足部，以表明動作與足有關。本義為踮着腳尖、抬起腳跟站立，引申有企望、企盼之義。《說文》：「企，舉踵也。从人，止聲。𠈮，古文企从足。」「舉踵」即抬起腳跟。段玉裁注：「按此下本無聲字，有聲非也。今正。止部曰：『止爲足。』說文無趾，止卽趾也。从人、止，取人延竦之意。」按「 企 」字足部漸從「 人 」分離，故字從「 人 」從「 止 」，段說可從。 甲骨文「 企 」用作地名。《屯南》179：「才(在)企。」《合集》19369：「田企東」，指於企地東方田獵。甲骨文、金文「 企 」用作人名。 由於「 企 」指踮腳站立，因而又可指翹首遠望，《漢書．高帝紀上》：「日夜企而望歸。」顏師古注：「企謂舉足而竦身。」「 企 」象踮起足尖眺望遠處，從而有了翹首遠望之義。人做出如此姿勢，定是有所期待，因而又有企望、企求、企盼之義(白川靜)。晉郭璞〈江賦〉：「渠黃不能企其景。」

The original meaning is standing on tiptoe, raising the heel, and extending the meaning of hope and expectation. "Shuowen": "Qi, raise the heel. From the person, stop the sound. 𠈮, the ancient prose is to follow the foot." "Raising the heel" means raising the heel. Duan Yucai's note: "Click here to download the silent word, there is no sound. This is true. The stop part says: "Stop is the foot." When the text has no toes, stop the toes. From the person, the stop, take the person to extend Meaning." According to the word " enterprise", the foot is gradually separated from " person", so the word from " person" to " stop" can be followed. Oracle " Enterprise" is used as a place name. "Tunnan" 179: "Only (in) the enterprise." "Compilation" 19369: "Tian Qidong" refers to the hunting in the east of the enterprise. " Enterprises" in Oracle and Bronze are used as names. Since " Qi" refers to standing on tiptoe, it can also refer to looking far away, "Han Shu. "Gao Di Ji": "Day and night and look forward to returning." Yan Shigu's note: "Enterprise means to lift one's feet and bend one's body." " Enterprise" is like standing on tiptoe and looking into the distance. People who make such a posture must have expectations, and therefore have the meaning of hope, hope, and hope (Shirakawa Jing). Jin Guopu's "Jiang Fu": "Qu Huang can't follow the scene."

Basic explanation of words
Enterprise
qǐ
Standing on tiptoe to see, today is used to mean hope: anticipating. Stand up and wait. To reach (hope to reach, hope to catch up). Attempt (conspiracy).

: The original meaning stands on tiptoe. Plan, conspiracy.
qǐ
I гл.
1) * вставать на носки (на цыпочки)
2) взирать с надеждой; чаять, надеяться, ждать с нетерпением; в чаянии, в надежде
企慕 взирать с восхищением
3) предпринимать попытку, пытаться; задумывать
可以企之 можно предпринять попытку к этому
II собств.
Ци (фамилия)
Radicals: 止  (stop, hat)
Meaning Mnemonic
The hat comes to a stop, thinking of a plan. The hat had been pacing around for a while, trying to think of how to get off the head he's resting upon and back into the house where it's nice and cozy, and came to the sudden realization of a plan. This caused the hat to stop.
Imagine a hat walking about on your head, pacing back and forth deep in thought. See the hat stroke its chin in contemplation as it tries to think up a plan to get off your noggin and back inside.
Reading Mnemonic
The plan that made this hat stop right in its tracks was very simple. First, obtain the key (き) to the house. Then, use the key to get in the front door. How simple!
Watch as the hat begins to grin. This plan is so simple it’s sure to work. Now watch as the hat obtains the key and enters the locked door. What sort of mischief will the hat get into once inside?
